generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible tram tracks and lane markings, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Buildings are visible on the right side of the road, with windows and balconies.
- fence: A fence runs along the left side of the road, behind the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including one with a traffic sign.
- traffic sign: A yellow diamond-shaped traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees line both sides of the road, and there are hedges along the sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and in the median strip.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy.
- car: A car is visible in the distance on the road.
- train: The tram tracks on the road indicate the presence of a train (tram) system.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- person: No person is visible in the image.
- rider: No rider is visible in the image.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
